About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

As an individual with a relentless drive to better myself, I have discovered a true passion for becoming a full-time, full-stack developer. This passion has been fueled by my exceptional understanding of logic and problem-solving, combined with my strong background in mathematics. Despite my relatively short time in this field, I stand out due to my unwavering dedication to learning and insatiable curiosity for new knowledge. While my primary focus is on honing my coding and algorithm skills, I also enjoy staying active outside of work. Whether I'm hitting the gym or the basketball court, or simply unwinding with a video game, I firmly believe that a healthy work-life balance is essential to achieving success in all areas of life. If you're interested in learning more about my experience and qualifications, please take a moment to explore the tabs on this website. I am confident that my hard work and dedication will be evident in everything you see

Full Stack Developer

Planet Fitness

Front Desk

As a former lead salesperson at Planet Fitness, I gained valuable experience in customer service, sales, and team collaboration while working at the front desk, managing inventory, and selling memberships. While this may seem like a simple job, it taught me the importance of being part of a team and creating a positive work environment. During my time at Planet Fitness, I worked hard to promote a family-like atmosphere, where everyone felt welcome and supported. This required me to develop strong communication skills and learn how to diffuse difficult situations with ease. These skills have proven to be invaluable throughout my life, and have helped me to navigate a variety of challenging situations with confidence and professionalism. In addition to my work at the front desk, Planet Fitness also provided me with a unique opportunity to improve my personal fitness journey. By being surrounded by others who were committed to bettering themselves, I found the motivation to push myself further and achieve my own fitness goals. This experience taught me the importance of setting goals and staying motivated, both in my personal and professional life. Overall, my time at Planet Fitness was a formative experience that taught me valuable lessons in teamwork, communication, and personal growth.
